top_comments.comment: Gigi , you have made a new standard for this song! Connecting the peace and the pain. Powerful and timeless.
4:45 and ended with a winner smile!!! RIP replay button
I love you Marygidget as Gigi now ! Soo proud ako binoto kita noon sa TNT pero still Winner ka parin KEEP SINGING 🎧🎶🥰
Sya ung Kelly Clarkson ng pinas rakista na pop. They can belt high notes effortlessly.
What I like with this girl is that when she sings , she makes it her very own by showing her own style and talent.... Terrible ....I'm getting crazy with your style of singing
